attributes.action: Stop giving serco all the contracts for our public services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop the government giving serco all the contracts for our public services

It inspects schools, trains, our armed forces, helps protect our borders, they have a few contracts to do with the NHS elderly hospital and home care services, maintains our nuclear weapons, runs our trains and operates all our prisons and prisoners. The same for Australia

Most of the public will never have heard of Serco, a FTSE 100 company that does 
all of the above and more. They need to be stopped

They are the company and get all the contracts for the NWO

rejection.details: It would be inappropriate to commit both this and any future government to a total ban on working with an individual company.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
